Class TurtleWorld

  • java.lang.Object
    • TurtleWorld
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<BumpingTurtle>, TurtleRecognizer

    public class TurtleWorld
extends java.lang.Object
implements TurtleRecognizer, java.lang.Iterable<BumpingTurtle>
    TurtleWorld provides a high level drawing context for a Turtle
